bibl.title: Polozheniye rabov v Vazantii VI v (preimuschestvenno po dannym zakonodatelstrava Iustiniana). [The Situation of the Slaves in Byzantium in the 6th Century - Chiefly on the Data of the Legislation of Justinian.]
bibl.note: Udaltsova Z.V., Polozheniye rabov v Vazantii VI v (preimuschestvenno po dannym zakonodatelstrava Iustiniana). [The Situation of the Slaves in Byzantium in the 6th Century - Chiefly on the Data of the Legislation of Justinian.]
